languages.text: {n}Грохочет выстрел — и из толпы доносится оглушительный визг. Вы замечаете, как тяжело раненный скоморох ускользает между людей прочь.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: Игрок стреляет в скомороха, скомороха ранит, он убегает
Игрок стреляет в скомороха, скомороха ранит, он убегает

languages.text: {n}A shot rings out, and a deafening shriek rises from the throng of people. You catch sight of the badly wounded fool disappearing into the crowd.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Грохочет выстрел — и из толпы доносится оглушительный визг. Вы замечаете, как тяжело раненный скоморох ускользает между людей прочь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A shot rings out, and a deafening shriek comes from the crowd. You see the badly wounded jester slip away from the crowd.{/n}

languages.text: {n}随着一声枪响，人群中响起了震耳欲聋的惨叫声。你看到那个受了重伤的小丑消失在了人群之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A shot rings out, and a deafening shriek rises from the throng of people. You catch sight of the badly wounded fool disappearing into the crowd.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Suena un disparo, y se oye un alarido ensordecedor procedente de la muchedumbre. Divisas al bufón malherido desapareciendo entre el gentío.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A shot rings out, and a deafening shriek rises from the throng of people. You catch sight of the badly wounded fool disappearing into the crowd.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Silah sesi duyuluyor ve insan kalabalığından sağır edici bir çığlık yükseliyor. Ağır yaralı soytarının kalabalığın içinde kaybolduğunu görüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A shot rings out, and a deafening shriek rises from the throng of people. You catch sight of the badly wounded fool disappearing into the crowd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Silah sesi duyuluyor ve insan kalabalığından sağır edici bir çığlık yükseliyor. Ağır yaralı soytarının kalabalığın içinde kaybolduğunu görüyorsun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}銃声が鳴り響き、耳をつんざくような金切り声が野次馬から起こる。重傷を負った道化を見つけるが、人混みの中に消えていく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A shot rings out, and a deafening shriek rises from the throng of people. You catch sight of the badly wounded fool disappearing into the crowd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}銃声が鳴り響き、耳をつんざくような金切り声が野次馬から起こる。重傷を負った道化を見つけるが、人混みの中に消えていく。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un coup de feu retentit et un hurlement assourdissant s'élève de la cohue, puis vous entrapercevez le bouffon passablement amoché qui disparaît dans la foule.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A shot rings out, and a deafening shriek rises from the throng of people. You catch sight of the badly wounded fool disappearing into the crowd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un coup de feu retentit et un hurlement assourdissant s'élève de la cohue, puis vous entrapercevez le bouffon passablement amoché qui disparaît dans la foule.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein Schuss ertönt und ein ohrenbetäubendes Kreischen steigt aus dem Pulk auf. Du siehst, wie der schwerverletzte Narr in der Menge verschwindet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A shot rings out, and a deafening shriek rises from the throng of people. You catch sight of the badly wounded fool disappearing into the crowd.{/n}
